paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the use of engineered heart slices incorporating human induced pluripotent stem cell-derived cardiomyocytes for cardiac studies. It mentions the KCNH2 gene in the context of LQT2 but does not provide specific genetic variant information.

challenges: The paper did not provide specific genetic variant information for KCNH2.
extraction_metadata.notes: The paper mentions LQT2 related to KCNH2 but does not specify any genetic variants.
